name: A Strange Hotel
description:
A Strange Hotel is a retro style 2D puzzle platformer, with a few precision platformer levels in between.



In this game you have to find the solutions to challenging puzzles while using your vacuum to grab physics objects in more than 50 hand crafted levels.



Discover and collect 12 secrets throughout the entirety of the game and unlock challenging extra levels.

Get enough money to unlock harder levels to give yourself even more of a challenge.
